bug.author: impulsecorp
bug.description: How do I use the parameters? If I use clf = ImageClassifier(verbose=True, searcher_args={'trainer_args': {'max_iter_num': 10, 'augment': False}, 'default_model_len': 3}) I get this error: TypeError: init() got an unexpected keyword argument 'searcher_args'

comments.comment: Thank you for your report. This is fixed in the latest release. Please reopen the issue if it is not.
